typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['parquet/5K/*']) ~> parquet5K
parquet5K sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['flights5K.avro'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> writeAVRO
